body:
Btw.
Way to go araaragoodie.
Show them how its done.
Lets show these sickos what is worthy publishing reading translating even saving and promoting and what its not.
And the not list is not even that long so its easy to recall:
No netorare.
No hypno.
No drugs.
No blackmail.
No gore.
No tentacles.
No rape.
No snuff.
Is it that hard to make sex appealing hentai without those?
I think not.

Shit its always like that :
They rape all the way thru the chain of command.
From commoners to royals.
From a single footsoldier to a whole battalion of warrior gals.
Unstoppable and relentless til they grab princis and even queens.
Heck even Valkyries and Goddesses get raped.
That really sucks.
Where are their powers?
Where are their saviors?
Know what sucks even worse?
That fans enjoy so much that kinda sick debase that the debauchery manages to leave b&w dj scribs to become full av hentanimes on both dvd and blurays.
Some pervys like blugal, taimanins and other tentacruelty like urotsukidoji even succed in becoming liveaction grotesques.
Totally unworthy.
Truly despicable.
Whats next?
Gory snuff?
Hope they dont dare to cross that infamous line.
And loli and shota are the indecent pervs?
Theyre the badies?
Never on my book.
No wonder japans birthrate is declining if theyre all obsessed with rape doujins. What woman would want anything to do with men obsessed with this debauchery
